name: Elemental Fighters
description:
Elemental Fighters

Take your GamePad and perform epic battle with element. Are you ready to master element ?!!

Elemental Fighters is my first 2D fighting game in Pixel Art. I have learning alone and don't hesitate to give me some suggestions or ameliorations for the game. There is only one character available, the Fire Warrior. But the second step is to create the Earth Warrior.

Please enjoy and contact me at potrunks@hotmail.com

GitHub : https://github.com/Potrunks/elemental-fighter.git

Credits :

Creator : Alexis ARRIAL alias Potrunks

Fire Warrior designed by Luiz Melo (https://luizmelo.artstation.com/)
